briefTitle: A Comparative Study of Mammography and Ultrasound for Breast Cancer Screening and Early Diagnosis
officialTitle: A Comparative Study of Mammography and Ultrasound for Breast Cancer Screening and Early Diagnosis
conditions: Breast Cancer Diagnosis, Breast Cancer Screening
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Informed consent, subjects 35-70 years old, asymptomatic, able to undergo ultrasound and x-ray

Exclusion Criteria:

* Localized breast erythema and ulceration, pregnancy, lactation, after previous breast implantation, already pathologically definite breast cancer patients
